revised_title: An Attempt at a Complete Osteology of Hypsilophodon Foxii, a British Wealden Dinosaur
tldr: The author, J. W. Hulke, presents a detailed osteology of Hypsilophodon foxii, a British Wealden dinosaur, and compares its structure with other fossil and extant Sauropsida. He maintains the generic distinctness of Hypsilophodon from Iguanodon based on the different structure of their hind feet.
